original_text: While he yet talked to the people, behold, his mother and his brethren stood without, desiring to speak with him.
korean_text: 예수께서 무리에게 말씀하실 때에 그의 어머니와 동생들이 예수께 말하려고 밖에 섰더니

sentences.original_text: While he yet talked to the people
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 아직 사람들에게 이야기하고 있을 때

sentences.original_text: behold, his mother and his brethren
